Producer: Dana Adam Shapiro, Tom Heller, Jeffrey V. Mandel, Randy Manis
Screenwriter: Dana Adam Shapiro, Evan M. Wiener
Production Co: TBD, Human Loves Human Productions, Renart Films
Synopsis: A photographer (Chris Messina) feels his commitment to his girlfriend (Rashida Jones) beginning to fade when he becomes obsessed with an enigmatic client (Meital Dohan).
Title: Monogamy
